CustomField.description: This is the potential conversion amount averaged at 30%. Used to calculate the potential of conversion into RAISE's. - NOT of the EOI itself, this field is for Executive Strategy Purposes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the potential conversion amount averaged at 30%. Used to calculate the potential of conversion into RAISE's. - NOT of the EOI itself, this field is for Executive Strategy Purposes
CustomField.label: Conversion Probability (30%)
